example.text: Mr. Schumer's stall tactics have created needless delays for military construction projects and kept our troops from receiving a pay raise on time. Thankfully, Republicans stood firm and prevailed.

Although many Americans were surprised at the bill's seemingly quick passage, in reality the bill was the product of months of negotiations between members of both parties. The final package reflected the hard work of Republican negotiators - in both the House and Senate - resulting in significant wins for conservatives and full funding for our nation's military.

With this bill now passed, we are well positioned to keep our enemies at bay in 2023. Other news this week: Wicker Praises Provision in Water Resources Development Act Miss. It will also boost support for our allies who are on the front line against Chinese and Russian tyranny. One of my top priorities was a provision requiring at least 31 new amphibious ships for the Navy, many of which will be built in Mississippi.
